fields_of_interest: Trade, Education and training, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport
eu_initiatives: To achieve a pan European training, test and accreditation programme in the air conditioning industry for vehicle  service technicians and workshops. To lobby the Commission in regard to decision making on F'gas related matters and to update our membership of latest information and directives in this regard.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: active participation in vehicle exhibitions ( Automechanica) and trade conventions (EAAC) . Regular press releases submitted to industry magazines.
goals__remit: to co-ordinate and support the activities of our members within the vehicle air conditioning industry and to uphold the F'gas regulations
